{"id":1787578066,"question_id":3202,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1759259656,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"67 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1787578066/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"High-Access Employees","memory":"53.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    struct Time {\n        Time(string s) {\n            h = stoi(s.substr(0, 2));\n            m = stoi(s.substr(2, 2));\n        }\n        int h, m; \n\n        bool isSameHour(Time& b) {\n            int ax = this->h * 60 + this->m;\n            int bx = b.h *60 + b.m;\n            return abs(ax - bx) < 60;\n        }\n    };\n\n    vector<string> findHighAccessEmployees(vector<vector<string>>& access_times) {\n        unordered_map<string, vector<Time>> mp;\n        for (auto t : access_times) \n            mp[t[0]].push_back(Time(t[1]));\n\n        vector<string> ans;\n        for (auto& [k, v] : mp) {\n            sort(v.begin(), v.end(), [&](const Time& a, const Time& b) {\n                if (a.h == b.h)\n                    return a.m < b.m;\n                return a.h < b.h;\n            });\n\n            int sz = (int)v.size();\n            for (int i=1; i<sz-1; i++) {\n                if (v[i-1].isSameHour(v[i+1])) {\n                    ans.push_back(k);\n                    break;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"high-access-employees","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1251}
